name: Sri Balaji Fridge & AC Service Center

projects.title: Air Conditiotioning Service
projects.description: From minor fixes to major overhauls, our general AC repair service covers all your cooling needs. Whether it's a faulty compressor, a refrigerant leak, or an issue with the thermostat, our expert technicians are equipped to diagnose and resolve the problem efficiently.

services.title: Air Conditiotioning Service
services.description: From minor fixes to major overhauls, our general AC repair service covers all your cooling needs. Whether it's a faulty compressor, a refrigerant leak, or an issue with the thermostat, our expert technicians are equipped to diagnose and resolve the problem efficiently.

services.title: Freezer Service
services.description:
Ice Cream Freezer Repair: Ensure your ice cream stays perfectly frozen with expert diagnosis and fixing of compressor issues, thermostat malfunctions, and seal problems.

Cool Drinks Freezer Repair: Keep your beverages refreshing by addressing temperature fluctuations, compressor failures, and refrigerant leaks promptly and effectively.

Ice Cream Cake Freezer Repair: Preserve the quality of your frozen treats with specialized repairs for frosting buildup, icing consistency issues, and compressor failures.

Comprehensive Freezer Services: From commercial coolers to residential units, our skilled technicians provide fast and reliable repairs, ensuring minimal downtime and maximum freshness for your frozen goods.

services.title: Refrigerator Service
services.description:
General Refrigerator Repair: Expert diagnosis and fixing of common issues such as temperature fluctuations, compressor problems, and faulty seals ensure optimal cooling performance.

Freezer Compartment Repair: Specialized attention to freezer compartments addresses concerns like frost buildup, defrosting issues, and noisy compressors, ensuring frozen goods stay properly preserved.

Refrigerator Cooling System Repair: Thorough inspection and repair of the cooling system components, including evaporator coils and condenser coils, restore efficiency and prevent breakdowns.

Ice Maker Repair: From ice maker malfunctions to water leakage, our technicians provide comprehensive repairs to keep your refrigerator's ice-making functionality in top condition.

Emergency Refrigerator Services: Available 24/7, our emergency repair service responds promptly to urgent issues, preventing food spoilage and ensuring uninterrupted cooling for your perishable items.

services.title: BMC Cooler
services.description:
BMC Cooler Repair: Ensure optimal performance of your BMC cooler with expert diagnosis and repair of compressor issues, temperature control malfunctions, and condenser coil problems.

Specialized BMC Cooler Services: From addressing refrigerant leaks to resolving fan motor failures, our technicians provide tailored solutions to keep your BMC cooler running smoothly.

Emergency BMC Cooler Repair: Available round the clock, our emergency repair service swiftly addresses urgent issues to prevent beverage spoilage and ensure uninterrupted cooling.

Preventive Maintenance: Regular servicing of your BMC cooler extends its lifespan and prevents costly breakdowns, including thorough cleaning, component inspection, and lubrication.

Comprehensive BMC Cooler Solutions: Whether for commercial or residential use, our BMC cooler services cover all aspects, ensuring efficient cooling for your beverages and peace of mind for you.

aboutpara:
With 20 years of experience in refrigerator and air conditioner repair, Sri Balaji Refrigerator & AC Service Center in Krishnagiri, Tamil Nadu is a trusted choice for your appliance servicing needs.


குளிர்சாதனப் பெட்டி மற்றும் ஏர் கண்டிஷனர் பழுதுபார்ப்பதில் 20 வருட அனுபவத்துடன், தமிழ்நாட்டின் கிருஷ்ணகிரியில் உள்ள ஸ்ரீ பாலாஜி குளிர்சாதனப் பெட்டி & ஏசி சர்வீஸ் சென்டர் உங்கள் சாதனங்களின் சேவைத் தேவைகளுக்கு நம்பகமான தேர்வாகும்.
